pr_title: CB-9926: Add retries to the legacy health check's ping

timeline.message:
CB-9926: Add retries to the legacy health check's ping

Add retries to the legacy health check's ping.

CB-10403: Fix legacy FreeIPA health check to use the result flag

Fix legacy FreeIPA health check to use the result flag in all cases.

timeline.bodyText: found variable is not necessary.  use  (!nodeMatcher.find()) should be good enough.
timeline.author: christmasferret

replies.bodyText: found tracks the state over multiple messages. The match should only occur on the first line of multiline output. If it doesn't appear in the first line as expected then the messages are logged.
replies.author: jamisonbennett

timeline.bodyText: precedingMessage = message.getMessage(); will have no effect here as mutating string will not change the string in nodeResponse above. Could append the message before addIssue()
timeline.author: christmasferret

replies.author: jamisonbennett

timeline.message:
CB-10455: Fix logic which treated unreahcable FreeIPA as reachable

Fixed incorrect logic which treated FreeIPA is being reachable when it
was unreachable and cluster proxy was used. In this case cluster proxy
returns 502 which was incorrectly treated as a successful connection.

Although it would become unreachable for other reasons (e.g. the 3
minute health check), the health API would report incorrect results
for up to 3 minutes. There were also misleading logs which stated
FreeIPA was reachable.

This was manually tested with a local cloudbreak cluster.

timeline.author: christmasferret

replies.bodyText: I will break this part out into a separate PR.
replies.author: jamisonbennett
